passiton.name: Donation of Solid Wood Sofa Set (3+1+1) â€“ Jurong East
passiton.description:
I would like to bless and donate a solid wood sofa set (3-seater + two 1-seaters) in good, usable condition through the Pass-It-On programme.

Item details:

Origin: Zen Tradition

Material: Solid, heavy wood with firm cushion seats

Condition: Gently used, structurally strong, minor wear on fabric edges

Includes: Main seat cushions only (small decorative cushions in photo not included)

Colour: Beige-gold fabric with dark wood frame. I will also include an additional spare set of cushion covers in red too

Quantity: 1 set (3 + 1 + 1)


Pickup details:

Location: Jurong East (lift accessible)

Preferred collection: By end of Oct (flexible on timing)

I can assist with coordination for movers or charity pickup. By the way, need to arrange for movers because only my elderly parents in the house.

a tablet would enable him to learn materials through videos, and for faster communication when social worker needs to reach out to him

name: Playmat
description:
A family with two young children is looking for a cushioned playmat or rug. As the family has a cat, they are looking for a playmat that can withstand cat scratches. Their downstairs neighbour has informed them that movements in the house can be quite audible. A cushioned playmat or rug would help reduce this noise and provide a comfortable play area for the children, whilst giving the parents peace of mind that they are not disrupting their neighbours.

Any donations would be greatly appreciated. Thank you!
